content: That's a great list of tips! I think I'll start by setting specific, measurable goals and tracking my workouts using a fitness app. I'll also try to celebrate small victories along the way to stay motivated. I recently participated in a charity cycling event where I initially aimed to raise $200 in donations for the local children's hospital. Speaking of goals, I'm still thinking about signing up for that triathlon in June. Do you think it's a good idea to start training for it now, or should I wait until closer to the event?
